title: MD
biography: Valentín Fuster Carulla, 1st Marquess of Fuster is a Spanish cardiologist and aristocrat.
aiSummary: Valentín Fuster is a prince of asturias award specialist with an H-index of 219 at Mount Sinai / CNICCardiology (Member). Has been published in The Lancet, New England Journal of Medicine. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
